name: Naughty Baby Boy Crying Challenges
description:
Naughty Baby Boy Crying Challenges is FREE Game TO PLAY & DOWNLOAD.
Best Game for Baby Sitter training.
In this game Just make than Happy.Make Sure that baby dose not cry.
We need to take care about baby's requiremet.
Take care of baby during bathing time,eating time.

Face the Baby Cry challenges. It is not easy to take care of baby.
It is very hard job to make baby happy.
If you think that you can make smile on baby's face than take the Naughty Baby Boy Crying Challenges.
